titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of funds appropriated for the Department of Defense for aerial refueling of aircraft of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
A bill to prohibit the use of funds appropriated for the Department of Defense for aerial refueling of aircraft of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits funds appropriated or otherwise made available for the Department of Defense from being obligated or expended for aerial refueling of aircraft owned or operated by the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
